targets.query: SELECT last("health_status") FROM "docker_container_health" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)
